pageProduct.name: Vicks Sinex Extra Fresh Menthol Nasal Spray 15mL
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Vicks Sinex ExtraFresh Nasal Decongestant Nasal Spray with aromas of menthol.

Provides 12 hour relief from nasal congestion due to colds, allergies and sinusitis.

12 hour relief.

Boxed Contents: 50 Doses metered pump nasal spray.

Size: 15mL

KEY FEATURES

• Nothing lasts Longer & Acts Faster
• Relieves Nasal Congestion

Warnings

If congestion persists, consult your healthcare professional.

Do not exceed recommended dose. Treatment should not exceed 3 days. Frequent or prolonged use may cause nasal congestion to recur or worsen. Do not use this product if you have heart disease, high blood pressure, thyroid disease, diabetes, or difficulty in urination due to enlargement of the prostate gland, unless directed by a healthcare professional.
If pregnant or breast-feeding, ask a healthcare professional before use. This product may cause temporary discomfort such as nasal irritation. Discontinue use if you experience symptoms of allergy, or if irritation is severe or persists. The use of this container by more than one person may spread infection. Keep out of reach of children. In case of accidental ingestion, seek medical attention immediately.

Tamper Evident: Do not use if seal over carton flaps are broken or missing.

CAUTION

Pharmacy Medicine. Keep out of reach of children.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Only selected information is listed on the bottle label. Therefore, you should keep this carton for future reference.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Oxymetazoline Hydrochloride 0.05% w/v

Contains: Benzalkonium Chloride and Benzyl Alcohol as preservatives, with Aromas of Menthol.

Directions

How to use Sinex Metered Pump Spray: Remove protective cap. (Before using the first time, depress the round tab firmly several times to prime the metering pump). Blow the nose before administering. Hold bottle with thumb at base, nozzle between first and second fingers. With head upright, insert spray nozzle in nostril, depress pump 2-3 times all the way down with a firm even stroke and sniff deeply.

USAGE ADVICE

Adults & Children 6 years and older (with adult supervision), 2 or 3 sprays in each nostril, every 10 to 12 hours, when required. Do not exceed 2 doses in 24 hours. Use in Children 6-11 years, only on the advice of a doctor, pharmacist or nurse practitioner. Must not be used in children under 6 years of age.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C.
